QuestData.Title: An Eclectic Accord
QuestData.Description:
While the storm over the Reach was raging, I gathered allies for our eventual return. I want to ensure they have everything they need, but I can't welcome all of them personally.
Would you be my envoy, $n? Can you make sure they have what they need? We have few supplies to offer and a shortage of assistance.
The least I can do is offer my gratitude. Please thank them personally on my behalf.
QuestData.LogDescription: Speak with the newly-arrived denizens of Morqut Village.
